title: Alpha Client
body: How long can we expect to wait to get signed up for it? I've read some people who've waited months, and haven't gotten it, but my friend got it in a week. I just signed up today, and just wanted some clarification on the matter, if someone wouldn't mind :)

replies.body:
Hey man,

You might find these FAQs handy - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/faq

**I SIGNED UP BUT HAVEN'T HEARD BACK YET. WHAT'S UP?
**
Acceptance notifications will be sent out in waves as it’s important to maintain test stability—we’ll get more players in as soon as we can.

**WHAT TYPE OF PLAYERS ARE YOU LOOKING FOR?
**
We want players from all over the world. Alpha access is limited to level 30 players (at least to start) with no history of negative in-game behavior. All gaming rigs are welcome, although since the client won't be perfectly optimized at the alpha’s start, players with lower-spec machines won't be prioritized early on. We'll work to get more machines in as we optimize the client.
I think I fit the description xD

Clean record meaning no record of actually having been found guilty of a anything? Or clean record as in no reports or bad feedback from other summoners?? 
Also, is there a way to check you're record? It might be worth knowing you're record so as to give an indication whether it's even worth applying for these types of things.

Depends really, they do have a list of requirements that you have to tick off (clean record etc.) so if you're a nice person with no reports, play with a lot of friends then you'll probably get it pretty soon. If you're more toxic than a decaying isotope of uranium then expect to wait along time.

Im almost notorious for being toxic on the boards and ive had alpha access for months now.

What actually gets you into the alpha by my guess would be demonstrating a critical way of thinking.

Just as i am quick to point out bullshit in league and back it up with why i think that, those "salt" skills also apply to good critical feedback.

or more accurately, you cant actually provide feedback if you are gonna whiteknight riot.

Thats why good businessmen dont surround themselves with yes men, they need someone with the balls to tell them their idea is retarded if its retarded.
Same as PBE, probably a few years unless you are diamond higher cause that's the only people Riot want testing it.
I'm Bronze IV and I started playing 6 months ago so this isn't actually true.
My friend's bronze 3 and he got it in a week...
it took me something like 3 months, i had honestly forgotten about it
They are selective. Chances are that you won't get access at all.
I signed up the day after it was announced and it's still pending :(

Yeah people have been waiting just like I have waited weeks. It  says that they will send a notification to your client aswell as a verification email. So you pretty much have to wait until they approve your signup.
